definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: In conclusion, photoperiod is an effective method to improve dairy goat production.
sentences.chinese: 综合上述，延长光照可有效增进乳羊产能。

sentences.english: By means of the method, a full-scale test pile in Zhenjiang Port has been analysed.
sentences.chinese: 对镇江大港原型试桩采用上述方法进行了分析。

sentences.english: The invention also discloses a producing method of above light leading board .
sentences.chinese: 本发明还揭露了一种制造上述导光板的方法。

sentences.english: In combination with the above, solar evacuated tubes provide for the domestic hot water needs.
sentences.chinese: 结合上述，采用太阳能真空集热管为家里提供热水。

sentences.english: Study the calculational methods of combinatorial sprinkler uniformity based on the above-mentioned mapped model.
sentences.chinese: 研究了基于上述映射模型的喷灌组合均匀度计算方法。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大常委会副委员长热地参加了上述活动。

sentences.english: Then, rinses the saliva including the approximately 10 milliliters , rinses 1 minute with the above method.
sentences.chinese: 然后，含约10毫升的漱口水，用上述方法漱1分钟。

sentences.english: The air-jet yarn strength of these three kinds material has attained the anticipatory aim.
sentences.chinese: 上述三种原料喷气纱的单纱强度均达到了预期的目标。

sentences.english: The district where the experiment was carried out was the area watered by the Tennessee River in the U. S. A.
sentences.chinese: 进行上述试验的地区正是美国田纳西河所灌溉的地区。

sentences.english: The following sub-sections will address the final three of the above steps.
sentences.chinese: 以下几小节内容将介绍上述后三个步骤。

sentences.english: All of these issues will be on the agenda tomorrow when I meet with President Hu.
sentences.chinese: 我明天与胡主席会晤时，会就上述所有问题交换看法。

sentences.english: A hardware-in-the-loop test bench was developed and was applied in debugging the algorithms that had been mentioned previously.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制的硬件在环试验平台对上述算法进行了调试。

sentences.english: None of the claims about the Prince were ever proven and no rumours were substantiated.
sentences.chinese: 上述对亲王的种种断言及风言风语都没有得到证实。

sentences.english: What does this sketchy historical record suggest for today's number one power?
sentences.chinese: 上述粗略的历史回顾，对今天的头号强国有何启示呢？

sentences.english: Enter each in the same manner as above.
sentences.chinese: 请按照上述的相同方式输入数据。

sentences.english: There are no or faint enzyme reaction products in low differentiated adenocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 低分化腺癌上述酶大都无反应或反应微弱。

definition: that level or lower/that amount or less/the following
that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
other/the others/else/other than it/in addition to the thing mentioned above
